text: geudaeneun (hananimgwa sadoleul) midgo seonhaeng-eul silcheonhaneun jadeul-ege gippeun sosig-eul jeonhala ; alaelobuteo gang-i heuleuneun cheongug-i geudeul-ui geos-ila. geudeul-ege geugos(cheongug)ui yeolmaega yangsig-eulo bepul-eojil ttaemada geudeul-eun malhadeola : “igeos-eun uliga ijeon-e bad-eun yangsig-ibnida.” geudeul-ege seolo biseushan moseub-eulo jueojin geos-ila. geuligo geudeul-eun geugos-eseo sungyeolhan baeujadeul-eul gajil geos-imyeo, geudeul-eun geugos-eseo meomul geos-ila
